item.title: Eye of a Pirate
item.dc:creator: @marauder1 marauder1
item.description:
@marauder1 wrote:

[scar]program Eye_of_a_SCAR;
var x,y,x1,y1,col,seperation:Integer;
begin
x:=20;
y:=129;
//activate client
clickMouse(310,109,true);
//find seperation
findColor(x,y,3961256,16,307,22,309);
findColor(x1,y1,3961256,360,307,366,309);
seperation:=x1-x;
//writeln(inttostr(seperation));
clickMouse(310,109,true);
wait(3000);
//distance between 2 pics: 344
//scan the screen
while(x<298) do
begin
while(y<310) do
begin
col:=getColor(x,y);
if (ABS(ROUND(col/100000)-ROUND(getColor(x+seperation,y)/100000))>3) then
begin
//writeln(inttostr(ROUND(col/100000))+’ '+inttostr(ROUND(getColor(x+seperation,y)/100000)));
clickMouse(x+seperation,y,true);
end;
moveMouse(x,y);
wait(1);
y:=y+7;
end;
x:=x+7;
y:=129;
end;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
